items.text: sticks onto the surface, this length delivery, punched past Mash to long-off.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: the pressure applied on Gayle has resulted in a release shot, only that it was mistimed to mid-off. Lewis walked into this stroke, looked to biff this slower length ball over the infield, but couldn't breach Mahmudullah, who took a nice catch with his palms facing the sky. Reward for some outstanding bowling from Mashrafe.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, OUT

dismissal.text: E Lewis c Mahmudullah b Mashrafe Mortaza 17 (29b 2x4 1x6) SR: 58.62

items.text: right behind the line of this length delivery as he defends
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: back of length that nips back in, bunted to the off side.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: eases this low full toss to long-off.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: sharp turn back in from length, defended back to the bowler.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: lunges forward and defends back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: works this shortish delivery weith the spin to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: tucks this gently towards midwicket for a quick single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: eased with the spin to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Bangladesh too were 31/1 at this stage
items.text: floats a full delivery into the pads, flicked into the gap at deep square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: mistimes a drive to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: works this off a length from outside off towards fine leg.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: gets a good stride forward and defends this full off-cutter.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: squirts this slower length ball to the off side.
items.postText: Asanka: "Everyone is criticising Gayle's low strike rate. Plz stop that. See he has returned to Odi after 913 days as he played his last game in March 21, 2015 Vs NZ. So he wants some minutes to settle and then he will come to his normal batting." -- Factually wrong. He was part of the World Cup Qualifiers in March too.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: bunts this into the off side, straight to mid-off.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.preText: About time West Indies looked to get a move on. Credit to the bowlers though
items.text: turns this with the spin to deep square leg.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: sharp turn that beats Gayle's tentative waft.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: turned to the leg side as he lunges forward.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: right in his hitting zone and Gayle belts this over long-off. Pure muscle, his eyes lit up the moment he saw this tossed up.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, SIX runs

items.text: defended back to the bowler.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: big appeal for lbw, the only question was if there was an inside edge as this skid back to hit the bat. Mushfiqur doesn't want to review. Umpire S Ravi was confident that there was some bat. Oh, dear. Replays confirm the ball would've smashed into the stumps, no inside edge either.
items.postText: Bangladesh would've had Gayle had they reviewed that.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: angles one back in from wide of the crease, Hope overbalanced as he looks to flick, dead in front of middle and leg, He's struck first ball. Gayle asks his partner to walk back and not bother reviewing.
items.postText: Had West Indies reviewed that, Hope would've survived . That ball would've missed leg.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, OUT

dismissal.text: SD Hope lbw b Rubel Hossain 6 (11b 0x4 0x6) SR: 54.54

items.preText: Local boy Shimron Hetmyer the new man in
items.text: thick outside edge to third man to get off the mark
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: beauty. Late movement to beat Gayle's tentative push.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Gayle, no run
